exercise.title: Docker Fundamentals - Introduction
exercise.description: Learn basic Docker commands and concepts

steps.instruction: Create a simple Dockerfile for a Node.js application
steps.on_correct: Great! You created a Dockerfile with a Node.js base image.
steps.on_wrong: Create a file named Dockerfile with 'FROM node:alpine' as the first line

steps.instruction: Add a WORKDIR instruction to set /app as working directory
steps.on_correct: Perfect! WORKDIR sets the working directory inside the container.

steps.instruction: Add CMD instruction to run node server.js
steps.on_correct: Excellent! CMD defines the default command when container starts.
